mapper.insert: insert into t_user (username, password, name, phone, email, status) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{status})
mapper.update: update t_user set username = #{username}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, status = #{status}, id = #{id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_user where email like #{query} or phone like #{query} or username like #{query} or name like #{query}
